channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 87 Edmonton Zone 51 South Zone 20 Central Zone 20 North Zone 41 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Fri, Apr 30, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Active VOC cases 14215 229 VOC Percentage 62% -0.129% Total VOC cases 33114 1132 Total VOC recovered 18811 901 Total deaths from VOC 88 2 VOC specimens screened 59119 1106 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Sat, May 01, 2021
